file_content.text: You worthless filth. You may've killed me... but you can't take away what I've achieved.
I worked for peace on Alderaan. I showed the houses how to settle their differences. What've you ever done for decent men?
I'll ask the questions here.
You're in no place to argue.
Don't talk--I'll try to bind your wounds.
Let me help you.
Ha! A little... a little late for that.
I protect decent people from terrorists like you.
Shut up. [Kill him]
You blind fanatic. You'll never understand....
Ah! I was starting to wonder if we'd meet face-to-face. Welcome to House Rist.
My name is Denri Ayl--but of course, you know that and so much more, after stealing my records.
A pleasure to meet you, Master Ayl.
Hello there.
Oh, and you.
How do you know who I am?
You recognize me?
I'm no fool.
I hear you've been looking for me for some time, "your highness." You claim allegiance to House Thul.
I hear you've been looking for me for some time. Tell me, Imperial--did you come all the way from Dromund Kaas?
I hear you've been looking for me for some time. Did the Empire hire you, mercenary, or is there a bounty on my head?
I know you're funding the Eagle and his terror network.
You're a terrorist.
Do you really? How satisfying for you.
Not that it matters. When we heard you were on your way, I arranged for my friends--at considerable expense--to prepare a traditional Rist welcome.
In other words, you planned this. Did someone tip you off?
This was a trap?
Let's just say I'm not the only person on Alderaan to believe the Empire's become a problem.
Surrender, Ayl. You're not getting away.
Give up.
I can't do that. And this is one situation where mediation isn't the answer.
Now, should you manage to drive past the poisoned blades of my Rist friends here, I'll warn you--I am a skilled duelist.
But I doubt that'll be relevant. Gentlemen... you may kill the intruder.
Why don't I show you a traditional Imperial welcome, instead?
Sounds fun. [Attack]
And I'll show you how to die!
I don't know who you are or how you got here--but you're going to leave now.
You're none of my concern. The Rist assassins will deal with you.
